20101220070116.000|20101220070121.000|CCO|SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA.
20101220070121.000|20101220070123.500|CCO|WE ARE ON STORM TRACK TONIGHT

20101220070126.000|20101220070128.500|CCO|EVERYTHING FROM FLOODING TO MUD

20101220070131.000|20101220070136.000|CCO|RAIN IS HEADED OUR WAY.
20101220070136.000|20101220070141.000|CCO|GOOD EVENING.
20101220070141.000|20101220070144.333|CCO|I'M JOHN HARTUNG AND I'M JOVANA 
20101220070144.333|20101220070147.667|CCO|LRA.
20101220070147.667|20101220070151.000|CCO|P.H.C. IS SHUT DOWN IN MALIBU 
20101220070151.000|20101220070154.333|CCO|AT KANAN ROAD AND HEADS ALL THE 
20101220070154.333|20101220070157.667|CCO|WAY TO POINT MAGU.
20101220070157.667|20101220070201.000|CCO|WE'LL BRING YOU NEW DETAILS AS 
20101220070201.000|20101220070203.000|CCO|THEY COME INTO THE "EYEWITNESS 
20101220070203.000|20101220070205.000|CCO|NEWS" NEWSROOM.
20101220070205.000|20101220070207.000|CCO|JOHN: IN THE SAN BERNARDINO 
20101220070207.000|20101220070209.000|CCO|MOUNTAINS, WE'RE GETTING WORD 
20101220070209.000|20101220070211.000|CCO|THAT A LOCAL LAKE HAS 
20101220070211.000|20101220070214.333|CCO|OVERFLOWED ITS BANKS.
20101220070214.333|20101220070217.667|CCO|THIS HAPPENED AT ARROWBEAR LAKE.
20101220070217.667|20101220070221.000|CCO|THE WATERS HAVE FLOODED A 
20101220070221.000|20101220070223.500|CCO|BRIDGE WHERE ARROWBEAR 
20101220070223.500|20101220070226.000|CCO|INTERSECTS WITH MUSIC CAMP ROAD.
20101220070226.000|20101220070228.500|CCO|SOME 75 HOMES ON THE NORTH SIDE 
20101220070228.500|20101220070231.000|CCO|OF THE LAKE ARE ISOLATED.
20101220070231.000|20101220070233.500|CCO|CALTRANSHAS BEEN NOTIFIED.
20101220070233.500|20101220070236.000|CCO|NO WORD ON WHEN IT WILL BE SAFE 
20101220070236.000|20101220070238.500|CCO|TO ACCESS THAT BRIDGE.
20101220070238.500|20101220070241.000|CCO|JOVANA: THIS IS ONE OF THE 
20101220070241.000|20101220070243.500|CCO|STRONGEST STORMS IN YEARS.
20101220070243.500|20101220070246.000|CCO|LEANNE SUTER IS LIVE IN LA 
20101220070246.000|20101220070248.500|CCO|CANADA FLINTBRIDGE, AMY POWELL 
20101220070248.500|20101220070251.000|CCO|IS LIVE WHERE IT'S A TOUGH 
20101220070251.000|20101220070252.667|CCO|NIGHT ON THE ROADS, BUT WE 
20101220070252.667|20101220070254.333|CCO|BEGIN WITH DANNY ROMERO.
20101220070254.333|20101220070256.000|CCO|DANNY: THERE IS WIDESPREAD RAIN 
20101220070256.000|20101220070257.667|CCO|OVER SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA.
20101220070257.667|20101220070259.333|CCO|THE AREAS OF CONCERN WE'RE 
20101220070259.333|20101220070301.000|CCO|TALKING ABOUT, THE FLOODING 
20101220070301.000|20101220070303.000|CCO|AREAS RIGHT HERE, RUNNING 
20101220070303.000|20101220070305.000|CCO|SPRINGS UP TO BIG BEAR.
20101220070305.000|20101220070307.000|CCO|THE YELLOW AREAS ARE INDICATING 
20101220070307.000|20101220070309.000|CCO|STRONGER RAIN, EVEN AT THIS 
20101220070309.000|20101220070311.000|CCO|HOUR.
20101220070311.000|20101220070314.333|CCO|SO THAT'S STILL A MAJOR CONCERN.

20101220070317.667|20101220070321.000|CCO|P.C.H.

20101220070323.500|20101220070324.750|CCO|WE SAW MORE YELLOW ON THE 
20101220070324.750|20101220070326.000|CCO|COASTLINE.

20101220070327.250|20101220070328.500|CCO|WHICH CAUSED ABOUT THE WARNINGS 
20101220070328.500|20101220070329.750|CCO|AND THE CLOSURES.
20101220070329.750|20101220070331.000|CCO|THIS RAIN THAT'S HAPPENING 
20101220070331.000|20101220070333.000|CCO|RIGHT NOW WILL CONTINUE THROUGH 
20101220070333.000|20101220070335.000|CCO|THE NIGHT, BUT THERE IS HEAVIER 
20101220070335.000|20101220070337.000|CCO|RAIN COMING UP.
20101220070337.000|20101220070339.000|CCO|THERE WERE SOME RECORDS BROKEN 
20101220070339.000|20101220070341.000|CCO|AROUND SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA.
20101220070341.000|20101220070342.667|CCO|LOTS OF THEM.
20101220070342.667|20101220070344.333|CCO|THE QUESTION IS, HOW MUCH MORE 
20101220070344.333|20101220070346.000|CCO|RAIN CAN WE GET?

20101220070859.000|20101220070901.000|CCO|WOODLAND HILLS.
